snippet.title: AeternoBlade II: Director's Rewind Trailer
snippet.description:
Game : AeternoBlade II [PC, PS4, XBOXONE, SWITCH]
Release Date : 11 October 2019 on Console , PC is coming
Producer : Noppon Wannapensakun
#Corecell #AeternoBlade #AeternoBladeII
--------------------------------------------------
AeternoBlade II Director's Rewind is coming on STEAM soon. 

Join Freyja, Felix and Bernard on the journey to save humanity. Wield the power to manipulate time. Amend your mistakes. Send your enemies back in time to relive their moments of suffering. Prevent undesirable changes. Convolute with alternate futures. With new gameplay updates,
enhanced power & abilities, new relics, secrets and much more!
.
Wishlist on Steam now!

----------------------------------------­-----------­-
[Buy the game on Steam]
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1249070/AeternoBlade_II_Directors_Rewind/

[Buy the game digitally via Playstation Store]
US : https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP4252-CUSA16444_00-AETERNOBLADE2001
Asia : https://store.playstation.com/en-th/product/UP4252-CUSA16444_00-ASIA000000000000


[ฺBuy the game digitally via Nintendo E-Shop]
https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/aeternoblade-ii-switch/

[Physical box on Amazon.com]
PS4: https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07TQ7YPVJ?ref=myi_title_dp
Switch: https://www.amazon.com/AeternoBlade-II-Switch-Nintendo/dp/B07VB476TB 

[Buy the game digitally via Microsoft Store [Xbox One] ]
Store: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/aeternoblade-ii/9ncls1nxtkkg?activetab=pivot:overviewtab
----------------------------------------­-----------­-
Don't forget to like and follow our game here.
https://www.facebook.com/AeternoBlade
https://www.twitter.com/AeternoBlade1
2019-2020©Corecell Technology Co, Ltd. All rights reserved.
